remarks: The product of a real number modulo a positive real number and an integer equals the product of the real number and the integer modulo the positive real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-May-2018.)
statement: modmulmod $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. ZZ /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) x. B ) mod M ) = ( ( A x. B ) mod M ) ) $.
